thread.title: South Korea's Moon upbeat in leadup to summit with Kim Jong Un

title: South Korea's Moon upbeat in leadup to summit with Kim Jong Un
text:
South Korea's Moon upbeat in leadup to summit with Kim Jong Un   01:12 
South Korean President Moon Jae-in said that a North Korean promise to cease nuclear and missile tests was a 'green light' for a historic summit between the two Koreas due this Friday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
South Korean President Moon Jae-in said that a North Korean promise to cease nuclear and missile tests was a 'green light' for a historic summit between the two Koreas due this Friday.
